sentences.en: A police blotter is a record of arrests and charges.
sentences.cn: 警察捕人记录簿是逮捕犯人和罪状记录簿.

sentences.en: B - the wet ink with a clean blotter please!
sentences.cn: 请用干净的吸墨水纸把墨水吸干.

sentences.en: He absorbed knowledge as a blotter does ink.
sentences.cn: 他像吸水纸吸墨水一般吸取知识.

sentences.en: He blotted the wet ink with a clean blotter.
sentences.cn: 他用干净的吸墨纸吸干墨水.

sentences.en: The ink was absorbed by the blotter.
The note, face upward on the blotter, was dated two days earlier.
sentences.cn: 这张便条正面朝上放在吸墨水纸上, 注明的日期是两天之前.

sentences.en: Use a blotter to take up the spilt ink.
sentences.cn: 用一张吸墨纸把溅出来的墨水吸掉.

words.tran_cn: 吸墨水；弄上墨渍或污渍
涂污，弄脏；用吸墨纸弄干（或除去）
记事簿，[会计]流水帐；吸墨纸

trans.tran_cn: 吸墨纸，临时记录簿，记事本
trans.tran_en: a large piece of blotting paper kept on top of a desk
